snippet: The Yankees on Thursday placed Carlos Beltran on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to Tuesday, with a sore right elbow.
abstract: New York Yankees right fielder Carlos Beltran is placed on 15-day disabled list with a sore right elbow.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees on Thursday placed Carlos Beltran on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to Tuesday, with a sore right elbow.

headline.main: Beltran Put on D.L. With Elbow Injury
headline.print_headline: Beltran Put on D.L. With Elbow Injury
